channel.title: Ad on Karthikeyan Sundararajan
channel.description: Recent content in Ad on Karthikeyan Sundararajan

item.title: azure-ad-user-list
item.description: Get user details from Azure AD Recently I came across a challenge in my work. We are using a CI tool and using an inbuilt authorization mechanism(roles) to control access to the users. CI tool is integrated with Azure AD. We had 300+ entries in the user > roles assignment list and reached the maximum limit. We also know that there are multiple people who left the organization whose entries are still present.

item.title: azure-ad-user-list

We had 300+ entries in the user > roles assignment list and reached the maximum limit. We also know that there are multiple people who left the organization whose entries are still present.
